name: Mitz's Ascent
description:
Mitz's Ascent is a coming of an age story with puzzle-platformer elements. Climb the Pit with the help of lovely characters from the Pit. 

Discover the top of the Pit as Mitz, a young villager from the people of Pit. Start your journey with the help of the "magical glove" to reach the top of the Pit. Noone manages to get outside before Mitz, but will it stop him?

This game is being made as a graduation project of Istanbul Bilgi University's Digital Game Design program.

Credits
  • Ghina Al-Halabi - Programmer 
  • Kaan Şen - Character and Concept Artist, Narrative
  • Ömer Kubalas - Level Designer, Programmer
  • Tulca Akbıyık - Game Artist
